DOC.brief_summary: A study evaluate safety , tolerability PK profile single multiple dos ASP015K healthy nonelderly men .
DOC.brief_title: Single Multiple Oral Administration Study ASP015K Healthy Nonelderly Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: This study consist two part ; single multiple administration part . In single administration part , multiple dose level ASP015K placebo administer Japanese Caucasian men evaluate whether ethnic difference pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics ASK015K . In multiple administration part , drug administer Japanese volunteer .
DOC.criteria: Healthy judge investigator subinvestigator basis physical examination test result Weight Japanese : ≥ 50.0 kg < 80.0 kg Caucasians : ≥ 50.0 kg < 100.0 kg BMI Japanese : ≥ 17.6 kg/m2 < 26.4 kg/m2 Caucasians : ≥ 18.0 kg/m2 < 30.0 kg/m2 Written inform consent obtain subject personally Administered drug another clinical study postmarket clinical study 120 day prior study Collection 400 mL whole blood within 90 day prior study , 200 mL whole blood within 30 day prior study blood component within 14 day prior study Received schedule receive drug treatment within 7 day prior drug administration A history drug allergy Upper gastrointestinal symptom , e.g. , nausea , vomit stomachache , within 7 day prior drug admission Concurrent previous liver disease , e.g. , viral hepatitis druginduced hepatic injury Concurrent previous heart disease , e.g. , congestive heart failure , angina pectoris arrhythmia require treatment Concurrent previous kidney disease , e.g. , acute renal failure , glomerulonephritis interstitial nephritis ( except previous urinary calculus ) Concurrent previous cerebrovascular disease , e.g. , cerebral infarction Concurrent previous malignancy Concurrent previous active recurrent infection , e.g. , hepatitis B , hepatitis C syphilis
